Window.Script: /*************************************************************************** 설 명 : 현금영수증 업체명 검색 팝업 만 든 이 : 남궁은희 만든일자 : 2009.08.13 적용일자 : 수정일자 : ***************************************************************************/ #include "LIB::training.js"; // 공통업무 관련 #include "LIB::sys.js"; // 공통 관련 function Form_OnLoadCompleted(obj) { gfn_Form_OnLoadCompleted(obj); // 공통 폼 로딩 이벤트 처리 // 폼 환경설정 ls_SystemGubun = gs_SystemGubun; ls_SystemMenuId = gs_SystemMenuId; var ls_FormId = split(sFormUrl, "::"); ls_FormId = split(ls_FormId[1], "."); obj.Title = sFormTitle + "(" + ls_FormId[0] + ")"; gfn_MakeRequiredInputMark(this); // 필수 입력란을 설정한다. ms_FormAuth = gfn_GetFormAuth(this); // 권한을 조회한다. if (ms_FormAuth == "W") { // 권한에 따른 버튼 설정 lfn_SetFormAuth(true); // 저장 권한 } else if (ms_FormAuth == "R") { lfn_SetFormAuth(false); // 읽기 권한 } else { gfn_Alert(MSGI00080); close(); } calDateFr.Value = left(GetDate(), 8); calDateTo.Value = left(GetDate(), 8); Cbo_Jibu_Init(); btnSearch_OnClick(); } /*----------------------------------------------------* * 콤보박스에 지부를 넣는다. *-----------------------------------------------------*/ function Cbo_Jibu_Init() { tit_clearActionInfo(this); tit_addSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchJibuList", false); tit_callService( "" , "" , ""//inDs , "ds_Jibu=ds_oJibu" //outDs , "" , "afterSearch_JIBU" //callBack , false ); } function afterSearch_JIBU(errCode, errMsg){ if(errCode != 0 ){ alert("오류가 발생했습니다."); } else{ var nRow = ds_Jibu.insertRow(0); ds_Jibu.SetColumn(nRow,"CD",""); ds_Jibu.SetColumn(nRow,"DATA","전체"); TAB_Training.tab2.cbxJibu.Index = 0; } } function lfn_SetFormAuth(bStatus) { } function btnSearch_OnClick(obj) { tit_clearActionInfo(this); TAB_Training.TabIndex = 1; //조회버튼 선택시 tit_addCsvSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchTrainingStat0100", false); ds_exampascond.DeleteAll(); ds_exampascond.DeleteAll(); ds_exampascond.AddRow(); ds_exampascond.setColumn(0, "STARTDATE", calDateFr.Value); ds_exampascond.setColumn(0, "ENDDATE", calDateTo.Value); tit_callService( "" , "" , "ds_iexampascond=ds_exampascond"//inDs , "ds_TrainingList=ds_oTrainingList" //outDs , "" , "afterSearch" //callBack , false ); } // 조회 후 callback function afterSearch(errCode, errMsg){ if(errCode != 0 ){ alert("오류가 발생했습니다."); } else{ if(ds_TrainingList.rowcount > 0){ } else{ } Chart_Start(TAB_Training.tab2.cbxBang.Value); } //trace(ds_TrainingList.SaveXML()); } /*----------------------------------------------------* * 탭 이동시 차트 조회함수를 call한다. *----------------------------------------------------*/ function TAB_Training_OnChanged(obj,nOldIndex,nNewindex) { var tabIdx = TAB_Training.TabIndex; if (tabIdx == 0 ) { } else if (tabIdx == 1) { // Chart_Start(TAB_Training.tab2.cbxBang.Value); } } /*----------------------------------------------------* * 함수 조회 함수 *----------------------------------------------------*/ function Chart_Start(strCode) { //-----------소숫점 자리수 표현------------------------------------------------------- TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.Axis[0].LabelsFormat.Decimals = 0; //소수점 자리수 표현 //TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.AxisX.Font.size="7"; //TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.Font.size="6"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.AxisY.LabelsFormat.Format = "AxisFormat_Number"; //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.OpenData("COD_Values", 1, 2); //축에 이름을 넣는다. TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.NValues = ds_TrainingList.rowcount; For(var j=0;j<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;j++) { TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.Legend(j) = ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(j,"GTTEAMNM"); } //값을 넣는다. For(var j=0;j<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;j++) { TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.Value(0, j) = ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(j,"LSDSCNT"); // TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.Value(1, j) = ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(j,"LSPASSCNT"); // } TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.DataEditor = True ; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.DataEditorObj.Docked = "Docked_Bottom"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.SerLeg(0) = "대상인원" ; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.SerLeg(1) = "수료인원" ; Phy_Start(strCode); Phy2_Start(TAB_Training.tab2.cbxJibu.Value); } //----------------------------------★★★★★★★★ //차트에서 콤보박스 변환 시(왼쪽) //---------------------------------- function TAB_Training_tab2_cbxBang_OnChanged(obj,strCode,strText,nOldIndex,nNewIndex) { Chart_Start(strCode); } /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------* * * * 파이 형태 차트 보여주기(왼족) * * * *------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ function Phy_Start(strCode) { //-----------소숫점 자리수 표현------------------------------------------------------- TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Axis[0].LabelsFormat.Decimals = 0; //소수점 자리수 표현 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.PointLabels = true; //TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Gallery = "Gallery_Pie"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Chart3D = true; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.BackColor = "white"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.BorderColor = "white"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.OpenData("COD_Values", 1, ds_TrainingList.rowcount); if (ds_TrainingList.rowcount == 0){ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Visible = false; }else{ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Visible = true; } if (strCode == "0") { //전체 For(i=0;i<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;i++){ var Value0 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(i,"LSPASSCNT")); TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Value(0, i) = Value0; } } else if (strCode == "1") { // For(i=0;i<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;i++){ var Value0 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(i,"LSPASSCNT_T60")); TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Value(0, i) = Value0; } } else if (strCode == "2") { // For(i=0;i<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;i++){ var Value0 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(i,"LSPASSCNT_T61")); TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Value(0, i) = Value0; } } else { alert("확인요망"); } TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.CloseData("COD_Values"); TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Point[2].SeparateSlice =35; For(var j=0;j<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;j++) { TAB_Training.tab2.XChart0.Legend(j) = ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(j,"GTTEAMNM"); } } //----------------------------------★★★★★★★★ //차트에서 콤보박스 변환 시(오른쪽) //---------------------------------- function TAB_Training_tab2_cbxJibu_OnChanged(obj,strCode,strText,nOldIndex,nNewIndex) { Phy2_Start(strCode); } /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------* * * * 파이 형태 차트 보여주기(오른족) * * * *------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ function Phy2_Start(strCode) { //-----------소숫점 자리수 표현------------------------------------------------------- TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Axis[0].LabelsFormat.Decimals = 0; //소수점 자리수 표현 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.PointLabels = true; //TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Gallery = "Gallery_Pie"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Chart3D = true; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.BackColor = "white"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.BorderColor = "white"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.OpenData("COD_Values", 1, 2); if (ds_TrainingList.rowcount == 0){ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Visible = false; }else{ TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Visible = true; } var strIdx = ds_TrainingList.FindRow( "GTMGNO", strCode );// //alert(strIdx); var Value0 = 0;// var Value1 = 0;// if (strIdx == "-1"){//콤보에서 전체 선택시 각 지부별 합격자를 더한다. if (strCode == ''){ For(i=0;i<ds_TrainingList.rowcount;i++){ var Val0 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(i,"LSPASSCNT_T60")) ; var Val1 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(i,"LSPASSCNT_T61")) ; Value0 = Value0 + Val0; Value1 = Value1 + Val1; } }else{ Value0 = 0; Value1 = 0; } } else {//특정 지부 선택시 Value0 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(strIdx,"LSPASSCNT_T60")) ; Value1 = ToNumber(ds_TrainingList.GetColumn(strIdx,"LSPASSCNT_T61")) ; } TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Value(0, 0) = Value0;// TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Value(0, 1) = Value1;// TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.OpenData("COD_Values", 1, 2); TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Point[2].SeparateSlice =35; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Legend(0) = "전문교육"; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart2.Legend(1) = "세미나"; } //====================================================================================================== //엑샐인쇄 시작---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- function btnExcell_OnClick(obj) { var strText = "특성화 교육 수수료 현황(건수)"; setExcelGridHeader(TAB_Training.tab1.gdList,strText); } //엑셀 함수 입니다. (위에 제목을 넣기 위함) function setExcelGridHeader(grdObj,strText){ create("grid","grdExcel",'BindDataSet="' + grdObj.BindDataset +'"'); grdExcel.contents = grdObj.Contents; var headCnt = getHeadCount(grdExcel); var totCol = grdExcel.GetColCount(); var irow; for(var i = 0 ; i < headCnt ; i++ ) { irow = toInteger(grdExcel.GetCellProp("head",i,"row")); grdExcel.SetCellProp("head",i,"row",irow+1); } var str_temp = grdExcel.GetCurContents(); var str_Head = '<cell align="left" col="0" colspan="' + totCol + '" display="text" text="' + strText + '"/>'; str_temp = replace(str_temp, '</head>',str_Head +'</head>'); grdExcel.contents = str_temp; grdExcel.ExportExcelEx("sheet1","A1",false,true,true); Destroy(grdExcel); } //엑셀 함수 입니다. (위에 제목을 넣기 위함) function getHeadCount(grdObj){ var strConts = grdObj.Contents; var iPos = pos(strConts,"<head>"); var strHead = Mid(strConts,iPos); iPos = pos(strHead,"</head>"); strHead = Mid(strHead,0,iPos+7); var spObj = split(strHead,chr(10),"webstyle"); return spObj.length()-2; } //엑셀인쇄 끝----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //====================================================================================================== //보고서 출력 function btnPrint_OnClick(obj) { gfn_CallReportPopup("frmBizTraining0100R01TrainingPassCountSpecial.rex" , "ds_TrainingList" , "datefr=" + calDateFr.Value + "^dateto=" + calDateTo.Value , true); } //차트인쇄 function btnPrintChart_OnClick(obj) { TAB_Training.TabIndex = 1; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.ToolBar = true; TAB_Training.tab2.XChart1.MenuBar = true; } //화면인쇄 function btnPrintWarmun_OnClick(obj) { printscreen(); }
